name: understory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a layer of plants and bushes that grows under the canopy of a forest (= the branches and leaves that spread out at the top of a group of trees forming a type of roof): There are many old plants, as well as a thriving understory of seedlings. The article examines the effects of surface ﬁres on understory and insectivorous birds in central Brazilian Amazonia.
